price: او دا چې له موږ څخه ځينې نېکان دي او ځينې له دې پرته، موږ بېلا بېلې ډلې يو.
arabic: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلصَّٰلِحُونَ وَمِنَّا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَۖ كُنَّا طَرَآئِقَ قِدَدٗا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: wa-annā minnā al-ṣāliḥūna waminnā dūna dhālika kunnā ṭarāiqa qidadan
